sentence: Stayed here for 3 nights during our trip in Oct 2014 and loved the place
This trip we stayed at the Mondrian for a few nights during the week of the Gramy Awards and it was loaded with celebrities and party goers
I recently completed a business trip to Los Angeles
They were amazing and I am sad to say that I nor my friends will ever book a hotel with Morgans Hotel Group ever again
Great trip Great Hotel
Gorgeous hotel but poor management not for families with Children
We stayed here for 2 nights at the end of a month touring around the States and it was the perfect way to cap off our holiday
Great hotel for couples or families with older children
Quick two day getaway
Great place when on vacation
Apparently family pictures are a no no yes very strange
Particularly one instance where a gent working at the hotel aggressively told five groups of guests inc myself waiting for cars to just hurry up and just get in their fricking Ubers

Also I have not written any negative review on any social media outlet except for contacting the hotel and the hotel group directly but after being falsely accused of writing bad reviews I take the opportunity to write one now
would not recommend for families with kids
Must admit that Mondrian LA is completely something else than the rest of Morgans Group hotels
Noisy a hotel for teenagers
Poor communication about the pool not being in use ruined our trip hotel is basic without it

We stayed here one night on a little anniversary trip and though the rooms are nice and well kept we could not get any sleep due to the noise from the club on the property outside and the noise from the ventilation system inside

When we arrived we were told that on top of the 781 that we had paid that we also had to pay a 200 bond per night for any damage that we cause or the minibar that we use as it was the end of our trip as you can imagine the funds were running low so we managed to convince the very serious man at the desk to drop it to 300
Not suitable for family trips to choose this hotel
